Text: World's Finest is actually turning into one of my favorite reads. IMO it is one of the best written comics DC has produced in a while. Keep it coming!
mirrormaster82, yeah the site's been dropping comments for a couple days. on suprbay they say they're working on it. ;-)  thanks for the new 52 week!
